advancement.enigmaticlockbox:cosmicScrol: Perform pilgrimage to The Architect's domain and become his devoted believer, earning the right to bear his mark and blessing

hold power to obtain and use this item.

book.enigmaticlockbox.entry.cosmic_scrol: The might of this rumor-shadowed scroll is denied to most demigods, even those who have approached the godship rather close. Who is permitted to possess it is at the discretion of The Architect himself, and as rumors would have it - the journey to $(l:https://discord.gg/fuWK8ns)his domain$(/l) is long and full of dangers, and to be noticed by that godly being is an honor few of its dwellers ever had.
Those who did, however, are awarded with power which has no equal; for the world to bask in their glory, and for them to spread the faith to the ears and eyes of others.
